title: Four-dimensional topological Einstein-Maxwell gravity
abstract: The complete on-shell action of topological Einstein-Maxwell gravity on four-dimensional manifolds with SU(2) holonomy is presented. It is shown explicitly how this theory arises from four-dimensional Euclidean N=2 supergravity. The topological BRST symmetries and twisted local Lorentz symmetries are given and the action and stress tensor are shown to be BRST-exact. A set of BRST-invariant topological operators is given. The vector and antisymmetric tensor twisted supersymmetries and their algebra are also found.
